body:
Dear awesome people,



For the past few weeks ive been attending the honeybee energy simulation series Chris made (great job! really enjoyed the serie. Many thanks!!!). Now I've started doing some exercises.



The problem;

the Honeybee_Adaptive Comfort Analysis Recipe as well as the Honeybee_PMV Comfort Analysis Recipe are giving me an error.



I've made a simple file but it's not doing anything better.

Is this a bug or is it just my ignorance



thanks!



Bart
topic: AdaptComfRecipe & PMVComfRecipe error; 1. Solution exception:expected float, got NoneType

replies.body:
Bart,

I think you attached the wrong file.

-A.

Hi!



yeah i see. my bad!

Here you go.

Some update was in order. I set the right end so you can see some outputs.

-A.

Abraham!



Many thanks for your time & help!



Bart
